Package it.polimi.ingsw.observer

Interface ObserverView

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientMessanger
public interface ObserverView
Default Observer interface for the view

      Tries to log the player to a certain lobby

      Tries to connect a client (new player) to a server socket

      Asks infos to a Lobby and notifies

      Disconnects a player from the game

      Sets the player's nickname

    • createPlayerDate

      void createPlayerDate(GregorianCalendar playerDate)
      Creates player's birthday date

    • choosePlayersNumberAndDifficulty

      void choosePlayersNumberAndDifficulty(int playersNumber, Difficulty difficulty)
      Sends a messagge to the server with the number of players and the difficulty of a match chosen by the first player of a certain lobby
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - number of players chosen for a match, in a certain lobby
      difficulty - chosen for a match, in a certain lobby

    • chooseTowerColorAndDeck

      void chooseTowerColorAndDeck(TColor towerColorChosen, AssistantDeckName assistantDeckChosen)
      Sends a messagge to the server with the color of the towers and the assistant deck chosen by a player
      Parameters:
      towerColorChosen - color of the towers chosen
      assistantDeckChosen - image of the assistant deck chosen

    • chooseAssistantCard

      void chooseAssistantCard(String cardNickname)
      Sends a messagge to the server with the assistant card chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      cardNickname - string which identifies the assistant card chosen

    • chooseCloudCard

      void chooseCloudCard(int id, String idString)
      Sends a messagge to the server with the cloud card chosen by the player at the end of his turn
      Parameters:
      id - of the cloud card parsed
      idString - of a character card (can be null)

    • choosePlaceAndStudentForMove

      void choosePlaceAndStudentForMove(String place, int id)
      Sends a message to the server with the new position of a student chosen by the player during the Action phase
      Parameters:
      place - where the player wants to move the student
      id - of the student to move

    • chooseId

      void chooseId(int id, boolean choice, int index, boolean none)
      Sends a message to the server with a character card's effect which involves moving a certain student
      Parameters:
      id - of the student to move
      choice - true for herald and curator effect, otherwise false
      index - for the effect of the Acrobat Card
      none - boolean used to finish the effect for the Acrobat Card (it can lasts up to 3 times)

    • chooseMotherEarthSteps

      void chooseMotherEarthSteps(int steps, int maxSteps, String string)
      Sends a message to the server with the new position of Mother Earth chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      steps - of Mother Earth chosen
      maxSteps - maximum number of steps in accord to the value of the last assistant card chosen by the player
      string - of a character card (can be null)

    • chooseCharacterCard

      void chooseCharacterCard(String characterNickname, boolean choice)
      Sends a message to the server with the Character Card chosen by the player
      Parameters:
      characterNickname - name of the Character Card chosen
      choice - set true when the card is activated

    • chooseColorToBlock

      void chooseColorToBlock(String color)
      Handles the effect of the Herbalist Card and Junkdealer Card Sends a message to the server with the color of the students that the player wants to block
      Parameters:
      color - of the students to block in the influence calculation or to remove from the entry
